mapper.sql: id, project_name, launch_name, return_content, return_count, support_price, freight, order_id
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT project_name projectName, content returnContent, `description_simple` launchName, t_return.`supportmoney` supportPrice, `freight` freight, `count` returnCount, `signalpurchase` signalPurchase, `purchase` purchase FROM t_project LEFT JOIN t_member_launch_info ON t_project.memberid=t_member_launch_info.memberid LEFT JOIN t_return ON t_project.id=t_return.projectid WHERE t_return.id=#{returnId}
